name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HireRight - LinkedIn AI Recruiting Tool for Sourcing & Outreach (by Brix)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline Your Workflow with Ease. Boost Productivity with Brix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedUp-LinkedIn AI Recruiting Tool for Sourcing & Automated Outreach(by Brix), an AI-powered tool designed by Brix Lab. This solution automates key recruitment tasks such as job description creation, candidate sourcing, and personalized outreach—all within Google Chrome. Streamline your hiring process and focus on building relationships with top talent.

How to Use
Install and pin the LinkedUp Chrome extension for quick access.
Log into LinkedIn and launch the LinkedUp extension.
Automate recruitment tasks like creating job descriptions, searching for candidates, and sending outreach messages.

Key Features
★ Automated Job Descriptions & Candidate Sourcing: Quickly generate optimized job descriptions and use AI to source ideal candidates on LinkedIn.
★ AI Talent Analyzer & Drip Campaigns: Analyze and rank candidates based on AI insights, then engage them with personalized drip email campaigns to keep them engaged throughout the process.
★ Seamless LinkedIn Integration: Effortlessly search, filter, and contact candidates on LinkedIn, with real-time profile access and advanced analytics, all powered by Brix Lab.
Category: Productivity
Privacy Policy: LinkedUp - Brix Workflow Enhancer has disclosed the following information regarding the collection and usage of your data. More detailed information can be found in the developer's privacy policy and terms and service
Support URL:  For help with questions, suggestions, or problems, visit the developer's support site
